title: Family Programs and Resources
copy: Family-friendly activities are always on offer in the Ryan Learning Center Art Exchange. Drop by to take part in a studio project designed by museum educators and artists. Create your own one-of-a-kind museum tour using the award-winning digital interactive, JourneyMaker . Find books, blocks, and other resources to spark your curiosity. Art Exchange activities are designed with children in mind and are open to all visitors to the museum. See other family-friendly spaces in the Ryan Learning Center, and check the calendar for the most up-to-date schedule.   Create and Learn Can’t make it to the museum? We have resources for families to enjoy together at home. From artmaking activities that use household materials to resources for parent-educators, you’ll find what you’re looking for to bring the museum to your home. Just click through .   With the Family Programs enewsletter, you can stay up to date on the latest family programs and offerings.
